column5: Once canoeing up the Humber River here in Toronto and saw a green heron doing that. It was so engrossed we canoed within arms length of it. Guess what I had forgotten to take with me that day?  If you answered 'camera', take a bow.   :wallbash:
Amazing that someone got that footage.  Those green herons are cool to see.  That is a smarter bird than average. Great stuff!
